mapper.select: select * from ( select distinct seq as center_seq, careNm, case when orgNm like '%서%울%특%' then '서울특' when orgNm like '%부%산%광%' then '부산광' when orgNm like '%대%구%광%' then '대구광' when orgNm like '%인%천%광%' then '인천광' when orgNm like '%광%주%광%' then '광주광' when orgNm like '%대%전%광%' then '대전광' when orgNm like '%울%산%광%' then '울산광' when orgNm like '%세%종%특%' then '세종특' when orgNm like '%경%기%도%' then '경기도' when orgNm like '%강%원%도%' then '강원도' when orgNm like '%충%청%북%' then '충청북' when orgNm like '%충%청%남%' then '충청남' when orgNm like '%전%라%북%' then '전라북' when orgNm like '%전%라%남%' then '전라남' when orgNm like '%경%상%북%' then '경상북' when orgNm like '%경%상%남%' then '경상남' when orgNm like '%제%주%특%' then '제주특' end as region from center_info group by careNm ) a where region =#{region}
select * from calendar_info where region = #{region} and careNm = #{careNm}
